channel.title: NPR Topics: Culture
channel.description: Art and entertainment commentary plus interviews, book reviews, movie reviews, music reviews, comedy, and visual art. Subscribe to podcasts and follow trends in music, painting, art, architecture, photography, and design.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2024 NPR - For Personal Use Only

item.title: 'Melania' is Amazon's airbrushed and astronomically pricey portrait of the First Lady
item.description: Amazon paid $40 million to acquire the documentary, and is spending $35 million more to promote it.
item.content:encoded:
Amazon paid $40 million to acquire the documentary, and is spending $35 million more to promote it.

(Image credit: Muse Films)
item.dc:creator: Bob Mondello

item.title: Catherine O'Hara played drunk better than anyone
item.description: O'Hara observed people closely; she found the tics, the mannerisms, the specific beats of drunkenness and used them to open us up to her characters' frailty, their vulnerability, their humanity.
item.content:encoded:
Schitt's Creek.'/>

O'Hara observed people closely; she found the tics, the mannerisms, the specific beats of drunkenness and used them to open us up to her characters' frailty, their vulnerability, their humanity.
item.dc:creator: Glen Weldon

item.title: These films took home top awards at Sundance — plus seven our critic loved
item.description: Vibes were all over the place during the 2026 Sundance Film Festival — the last held in Park City, Utah. These are the movies critic Aisha Harris loved.
item.content:encoded: Vibes were all over the place during the 2026 Sundance Film Festival — the last held in Park City, Utah. These are the movies critic Aisha Harris loved.
item.dc:creator: Aisha Harris

item.title: Lila Iké learned what "self-love" means with her Grammy-nominated album
item.description: Lila Iké's full-length debut album, Treasure Self Love, has been nominated for a Grammy. Iké spoke to All Things Considered about being one of the only women ever to receive a nomination for best reggae album.
item.content:encoded:
Lila Iké's full-length debut album, Treasure Self Love, has been nominated for a Grammy. Iké spoke to All Things Considered about being one of the only women ever to receive a nomination for best reggae album.

(Image credit: Destinee Condison)
item.dc:creator: Ailsa Chang

item.title: Catherine O'Hara, who starred in 'Home Alone' and 'Schitt's Creek,' dies at 71
item.description: O'Hara enjoyed a six-decade career in TV and films playing sometimes over-the-top, but endearing characters. "I loved playing cocky untalented people," she told Fresh Air in 1992.
item.content:encoded:
O'Hara enjoyed a six-decade career in TV and films playing sometimes over-the-top, but endearing characters. "I loved playing cocky untalented people," she told Fresh Air in 1992.

(Image credit: Chris Pizzello)
item.dc:creator: Mandalit del Barco

item.title: 'Islands' is a spare and satisfying slow-burn thriller
item.description: A washed-up tennis pro gives lessons at a fancy hotel in the Canary Islands. But when he meets an elegant woman with an unlikable husband, things take a noirish turn.
item.content:encoded: A washed-up tennis pro gives lessons at a fancy hotel in the Canary Islands. But when he meets an elegant woman with an unlikable husband, things take a noirish turn.
item.dc:creator: John Powers

item.title: Filmmaker Guillermo del Toro says 'I'd rather die' than use generative AI
item.description: Del Toro's Frankenstein, which reimagines Mary Shelley's 1818 Gothic novel, has been nominated for nine Academy Awards, including Best Picture. Originally broadcast Oct. 23, 2025.
item.content:encoded: Del Toro's Frankenstein, which reimagines Mary Shelley's 1818 Gothic novel, has been nominated for nine Academy Awards, including Best Picture. Originally broadcast Oct. 23, 2025.
item.dc:creator: Terry Gross

item.title: Want to be part of a village? You might need to get out of your comfort zone
item.description: If you've always dreamed of having a village but feel disconnected from your community, try these five tips. Plus: We want to hear from you. Tell us how you cultivate community where you live.
item.content:encoded: If you've always dreamed of having a village but feel disconnected from your community, try these five tips. Plus: We want to hear from you. Tell us how you cultivate community where you live.
item.dc:creator: Marielle Segarra

item.title: Meet Mediocre Bunny, the non-Spanish speaker learning Bad Bunny songs
item.description: Niklaus Miller, aka the Mediocre Bunny, has spent months learning Bad Bunny's songs ahead of the superstar's Super Bowl half-time show. Millions of fans have tagged along for the journey. Now, he's begging the universe for a ticket. Will it deliver?
item.content:encoded:
Niklaus Miller, aka the Mediocre Bunny, has spent months learning Bad Bunny's songs ahead of the superstar's Super Bowl half-time show. Millions of fans have tagged along for the journey. Now, he's begging the universe for a ticket. Will it deliver?

(Image credit: Jessica Pons for NPR)
item.dc:creator: Vanessa Romo

item.title: For U.S. figure skating, grief over the D.C. crash makes for a bittersweet Olympics
item.description: In the wake of the Jan. 2025 plane crash, some young skaters weren't sure they could continue. A year later, many have found that's the best way to honor those they lost.
item.content:encoded:
In the wake of the Jan. 2025 plane crash, some young skaters weren't sure they could continue. A year later, many have found that's the best way to honor those they lost.

(Image credit: Tyrone Turner for NPR)
item.dc:creator: Rachel Treisman
